title: Confusing & broken Inheritance - Nightly 1.77.2
author: pauldurham
body_snippet:
The items below are incredibly confusing without proper help text, and don't seem to work as expected:
- Inheritance
- Default Properties
- Default inheritance

It is not obvious how to use the above functions.  Also, the default inheritance doesn't appear to work.

## Expected Behavior
The above items should allow the user to set default properties & inheritance and then turn on inheritance, but they don't seems to work properly.  This is assuming I am even configuring the settings corr...

comments.snippet: I completely agree with this point, we already had a discussion about the inheritance in regards with the Clipboard Settings in Issue #1968.
